code: import React from'react';import'./css/HomePage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HomePage=_ref=>{let{onSearch,books,searchTerm,onAddToMyList,userBooks,genres,selectedGenre,onGenreChange}=_ref;const handleSearchChange=e=>{onSearch(e.target.value);};const handleGenreChange=e=>{onGenreChange(e.target.value);};const filteredBooks=books.filter(book=>{const matchesSearchTerm=book.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase());const matchesGenre=selectedGenre?book.genre.id===parseInt(selectedGenre):true;return matchesSearchTerm&&matchesGenre;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search-bar-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search books...",value:searchTerm,onChange:handleSearchChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:selectedGenre,onChange:handleGenreChange,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"All Genres"}),genres.map(genre=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:genre.id,children:genre.genre},genre.id))]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"book-list",children:filteredBooks.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.image_url,alt:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:book.author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onAddToMyList(book.id),disabled:userBooks.some(userBook=>userBook.id===book.id),children:userBooks.some(userBook=>userBook.id===book.id)?'Added to List':'Add to My List'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>window.location.href="/books/".concat(book.id),children:"See More"})]},book.id))})]});};export default HomePage;
